articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Marli Mesibov)
articles.description: Storytelling is a powerful tool for any UX designer. It helps create a product and understand the people who use it. articles.description: Whether you work in-house or run a digital agency, there are occasions when you will consider hiring freelancers to supplement your team. articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Vitaly Friedman)

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Dan Donald)
